questions.question: In Delta modulation,

answers.a: One bit per sample is transmitted
answers.b: All the coded bits used for sampling are transmitted
answers.d: Both a) and c) are correct

questions.explanation: In delta modulation as 1bit quantizer is used 1bit per sample is sent during transmission and the step size is also fixed.

questions.question: Which type of modulation technique requires minimum bandwidth in digital transmission?
questions.explanation: In delta modulation as 1bit quantizer is used 1bit per sample is sent during transmission and the step size is also fixed.

questions.question: Bit rate of Delta Modulation is_______________
questions.explanation: As per the formula of bit rate delta modulation, Rb=n*fs.

questions.question: What type of conversion is involved in Delta modulation?
questions.explanation: Delta modulation is a process of analog to digital and digital to analog conversion technique which is used for transmission of voice signals.

questions.question: Pick the process used to achieve high signal to noise ratio (SNR) in delta modulation.
questions.explanation: The SNR can be increased by keeping fs very greater then the message frequency.
